objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 167 leaves in Oriya script. Apparently written in ... CE.

history.p: Purchased in 1956 from a certain Narasingha Misra.

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

normalization.p: None. The difference between ẏ and y, ḷ and l, ṛ and ḍ, and between capital and lower-case vowels needs to be removed to obtain more normal Sanskrit spelling. Numerous (all?) cases of intervocalic ch need to be changed to cch. Distinction between b and v needs to be introduced.
